005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.adapter.MetaschemaDataTypeProvider;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.InvalidValueForCastFunctionException;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.impl.NonNegativeIntegerItemImpl;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.type.IAtomicOrUnionType;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.type.InvalidTypeMetapathException;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
014
015import java.math.BigInteger;
016
017import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
018
019/**
020 * An atomic Metapath item containing a non-negative integer data value.
021 */
022public interface INonNegativeIntegerItem extends IIntegerItem {
023  /**
024   * The integer value "1".
025   */
026  @NonNull
027  INonNegativeIntegerItem ONE = valueOf(ObjectUtils.notNull(BigInteger.ONE));
028  /**
029   * The integer value "0".
030   */
031  @NonNull
032  INonNegativeIntegerItem ZERO = valueOf(ObjectUtils.notNull(BigInteger.ZERO));
033
034  /**
035   * Get the type information for this item.
036   *
037   * @return the type information
038   */
039  @NonNull
040  static IAtomicOrUnionType<INonNegativeIntegerItem> type() {
041    return MetaschemaDataTypeProvider.NON_NEGATIVE_INTEGER.getItemType();
042  }
043
044  @Override
045  default IAtomicOrUnionType<? extends INonNegativeIntegerItem> getType() {
046    return type();
047  }
048
049  /**
050   * Create an item from an existing integer value.
051   *
052   * @param value
053   *          a string representing an integer value
054   * @return the item
055   * @throws InvalidTypeMetapathException
056   *           if the provided value is not a non-negative integer
057   */
058  @NonNull
059  static INonNegativeIntegerItem valueOf(@NonNull String value) {
060    try {
061      return valueOf(MetaschemaDataTypeProvider.NON_NEGATIVE_INTEGER.parse(value));
062    } catch (IllegalArgumentException ex) {
063      throw new InvalidTypeMetapathException(
064          null,
065          String.format("Invalid non-negative integer value '%s'. %s",
066              value,
067              ex.getLocalizedMessage()),
068          ex);
069    }
070  }
071
072  /**
073   * Create an item from an existing integer value.
074   *
075   * @param value
076   *          an integer value
077   * @return the item
078   * @throws InvalidTypeMetapathException
079   *           if the provided value is not a non-negative integer
080   */
081  @NonNull
082  static INonNegativeIntegerItem valueOf(@NonNull INumericItem value) {
083    return valueOf(value.asInteger());
084  }
085
086  /**
087   * Create an item from an existing integer value.
088   *
089   * @param value
090   *          an integer value
091   * @return the item
092   * @throws InvalidTypeMetapathException
093   *           if the provided value is not a non-negative integer
094   */
095  @SuppressWarnings("null")
096  @NonNull
097  static INonNegativeIntegerItem valueOf(long value) {
098    return valueOf(BigInteger.valueOf(value));
099  }
100
101  /**
102   * Create an item from an existing integer value.
103   *
104   * @param value
105   *          an integer value
106   * @return the item
107   * @throws InvalidTypeMetapathException
108   *           if the provided value is not a non-negative integer
109   */
110  @NonNull
111  static INonNegativeIntegerItem valueOf(@NonNull BigInteger value) {
112    if (value.compareTo(BigInteger.ZERO) < 0) {
113      throw new InvalidTypeMetapathException(
114          null,
115          String.format("Integer value '%s' must not be negative.", value));
116    }
117    return new NonNegativeIntegerItemImpl(value);
118  }
119
120  /**
121   * Cast the provided type to this item type.
122   *
123   * @param item
124   *          the item to cast
125   * @return the original item if it is already this type, otherwise a new item
126   *         cast to this type
127   * @throws InvalidValueForCastFunctionException
128   *           if the provided {@code item} cannot be cast to this type
129   */
130  @NonNull
131  static INonNegativeIntegerItem cast(@NonNull IAnyAtomicItem item) {
132    try {
133      return item instanceof INonNegativeIntegerItem
134          ? (INonNegativeIntegerItem) item
135          : item instanceof INumericItem
136              ? valueOf((INumericItem) item)
137              : valueOf(item.asString());
138    } catch (InvalidTypeMetapathException ex) {
139      throw new InvalidValueForCastFunctionException(ex);
140    }
141  }
142
143  @Override
144  default INonNegativeIntegerItem castAsType(IAnyAtomicItem item) {
145    return cast(item);
146  }
147}
